features.subtitle: Professional solutions for film lighting with long tradition and experience

balloons.title: Helium balloons
balloons.description: Professional helium balloons for lighting interiors and exteriors with high performance and quality.

film.title: Film industry
film.description: Specialization in lighting for film and television productions, commercials and documentaries.

lighting.title: Various lighting types
lighting.description: Yellow (tungsten), white (HMI) and combined lighting for every production.

quality.title: Professional quality
quality.description: High quality and reliability for demanding film projects.

products.title: Gear
products.subtitle: Specialized lighting equipment for film and advertising

balloons.name: Spherical Balloons / Spheres
balloons.description: Professional helium balloons for lighting interiors and exteriors in the film industry. Shadowless 360° flicker-free lighting.

ledCube.name: LED Cube
ledCube.description: Modular LED cube with high power 4.8 KW and fully adjustable light color (2700K-6500K)

tube.name: Sirocco Tube / Airstar Tube
tube.description: Cylindrical balloons for lighting in lower ceiling heights and tunnels. Shadowless 360° lighting.

cloud.name: Cloud / Pad Light
cloud.description: Flat diffused lighting with 2.5 KW power for subtle light effects and atmospheric scenes

flatLight.name: Flat Light
flatLight.description: Flat lighting for even light distribution on set, ideal for shadow elimination

sunCut.name: Sun Cut
sunCut.description: Special lighting for simulating sunlight and creating natural shadows

underwater.name: Underwater lights
underwater.description: Waterproof lighting for underwater filming and humid environments

page.title: Gear
page.subtitle: Specialized lighting equipment
page.description: We specialize in professional helium balloons for film lighting. We offer a wide range of powers and lighting types for every production.

lightingTypes.title: Lighting types
lightingTypes.subtitle: We offer different types of lighting for every production

tungsten.title: Tungsten (Yellow)
tungsten.description: Classic yellow lighting with warm light color (3200K), ideal for interiors and night scenes. Suitable for creating warm, natural atmosphere.

hmi.title: HMI (White)
hmi.description: White daylight with high power (5600K), perfect for exteriors and day scenes. Excellent for simulating daylight.

combined.title: Combined
combined.description: Combination of tungsten (3200K) and HMI (5600K) for flexible lighting of various scenes and conditions. Ability to switch between both lighting types.

usage.title: Light Usage During Filming
usage.subtitle: Photos from filming showing our lighting in action

films.title: Films We Contributed To
films.subtitle: Our Film Projects
films.description: Our lighting has been used in a number of successful Czech and international films.

about.title: About us
about.description1: We are partners for cinematographers and gaffers. We offer glare-free lighting for night exteriors, interiors and events. More than 15 years of experience on set.
about.description2: We specialize in shadowless 360° flicker-free lighting. Our equipment is designed for demanding professional projects and meets the highest quality standards for high-end cinema productions.

services.title: Our services
services.rental: Rental of helium balloons for film lighting
services.solutions: Complete lighting solutions for film productions

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: We have many years of experience in film lighting and work with leading Czech and international productions. Our equipment has been used in a number of successful film and television projects.

references.title: References
references.subtitle: Our projects
references.description: Our lighting has been used in a number of successful film, television and commercial projects

films.title: Film productions
films.description: Our lighting has been used in a number of successful Czech and international films.

tv.title: Television productions
tv.description: We work with leading television stations on various projects.

ads.title: Commercials and documentaries
ads.description: You can also find our lighting in commercials and documentaries.

footer.description: Professional helium balloons for lighting interiors and exteriors in the film industry.

meta.description: BALLOON LIGHT PRAG - Specialized lighting equipment for film and advertising. Shadowless 360° light. Flicker-free. HMI & Tungsten.
